definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同学便利用星期日赶到台北和张先生见面。

sentences.english: We are going to have a test on Lesson Two next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周星期一要考第二课。

sentences.english: I must be in town next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我下星期六一定要进城去。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱们暂时不要考虑，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱们暂时不要考虑，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: At 16 weeks, I was offered an amniocentesis test.
sentences.chinese: 16个星期的时候，我做了羊水穿刺测试。

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈迈迪内贾德星期三将在伊朗议会上正式就任总统。

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫妇在北京参加奥运开幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: Try living for a week in an "other centered" universe.
sentences.chinese: 尝试着一个星期生活在一个以“他人为中心”的世界。

sentences.english: Be passionate about your work although toady is Monday.
sentences.chinese: 虽然今天是星期一，但是保持你的工作热情。

sentences.english: But you only have two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 但是你只有两个星期了。

sentences.english: This coupon isn't good for Saturdays and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 这张联票不能用于星期六和星期日。

sentences.english: This coupon isn't good for Saturdays and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 这张联票不能用于星期六和星期日。

sentences.english: I am going to Haverhill to-morrow, surveying, for a week or more.
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去黑佛希尔测量，大约得一个多星期。

sentences.english: The old bridge was last week .
sentences.chinese: 那座旧桥上个星期被拆除了。

sentences.english: Eve Marie Carson was found Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 伊夫玛丽卡森在星期三被发现。

definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
